name: Cera
long_description:
Cera is the Robinhood for Web3.  We bring stock investing opportunities to everyone in the world, via our first-class support for stablecoins, one of the world's most accessible currencies in nearly every country.

With a strong founding team with many years of experiences building and scaling billion-user products at Facebook and Google, we aim to provide our users the most seamless and highly intuitive product that scales well with the tremendous growth of the crypto community.
